external_games.name: National Park Girls - Episode 3: Daughter of Zion

name: National Park Girls: Episode 3 - Daughter of Zion
summary: National Park Girls - Episode 3: Daughter of Zion is the third installment in the episodic visual novel National Park Girls. Yosemite has always been cranky, but she's been acting stranger than usual lately. Could it possibly have something to do with Zion?
